attributes.action: compel firms to pay a basic wage during certifcated periods of sickness,comprised of ssp made up to the basic weekly wage
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i believe that ssp is totally insufficient to meet most peoples needs and that it would be helpful if firms would pay a basic wage.there could be an insurance paid for by the companies which they could claim on.i realise that this idea needs some fine tuning but i believe that this would relieve pressure on families
